Pre-Game Insights: Lebanon are ranked 107th in the world and have never advanced past the group stage in the Asian Cup, having lost their opener 3-0.
China PR drew their opener 0-0 against Tajikistan, having 30 shots between them but failing to convert chances.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will be the seventh meeting between Lebanon and China PR, with China PR winning five and drawing one of their six previous encounters.
Three of Lebanon's last four games have produced more goals in the second half than the first.
Others: Lebanon have won just one of their last seven games (four losses) while China PR have also won just one of their last six games (four losses).
